nodes.label: Receive Request
nodes.description: Intake client or stakeholder content request and define initial scope

nodes.label: Research & Insights
nodes.description: Gather audience data, competitive intel, and trending topics to inform the brief

nodes.label: Write Brief
nodes.description: Create a structured content brief with objectives, audience, key messages, and format

nodes.label: Draft Content
nodes.description: Write the first draft based on the approved brief and brand voice guidelines

nodes.label: SEO Optimization
nodes.description: Optimize draft for search: keywords, meta descriptions, headings, internal links

nodes.label: Check Brand Compliance
nodes.description: Validate content against brand guidelines for tone, terminology, and messaging

nodes.label: Final Edit
nodes.description: Human editor refines content for narrative flow, nuance, and final polish

nodes.label: Schedule & Publish
nodes.description: Set publication date, configure CMS, and push content live

nodes.label: Distribute Content
nodes.description: Push content across channels: social, email, syndication, paid amplification

nodes.label: Track Performance
nodes.description: Monitor engagement, traffic, conversions, and social signals in real time

nodes.label: Generate Report
nodes.description: Compile performance data into an actionable report with recommendations

nodes.label: Optimize Content
nodes.description: Update headlines, CTAs, distribution mix, or repurpose based on performance data

nodes.label: Brief Approval
nodes.description: Content lead reviews the brief for clarity, feasibility, and strategic alignment

meta.autoPassCriteria: All required fields complete and strategy score above 80%
meta.escalationTrigger: Brief requires new audience segment or unplanned budget

nodes.label: Quality Check
nodes.description: Automated quality gate checking readability, factual accuracy, and SEO score

meta.autoPassCriteria: Readability score > 70, SEO score > 85, no factual flags
meta.escalationTrigger: Factual claim flagged or readability below 50

nodes.label: Brand Review
nodes.description: Check content against brand guidelines; agent flags issues, human approves exceptions

meta.escalationTrigger: Brand score below 70% or new tone requested

nodes.label: Stakeholder Sign-off
nodes.description: Final human approval before publication, checking strategic alignment and legal compliance

meta.autoPassCriteria: All upstream gates passed, content sensitivity score below threshold, no legal flags
meta.escalationTrigger: Sensitive topic, legal risk, or executive-visibility content

nodes.label: Performance Review
nodes.description: Evaluate content performance against KPIs; decide whether to optimize, iterate, or archive

meta.autoPassCriteria: Meets 80% of target KPIs within first 7 days
meta.escalationTrigger: Performance below 50% of target or negative sentiment detected

nodes.label: Research Agent
nodes.description: Gathers audience data, competitive intelligence, and trending topics to inform briefs

meta.capability: Synthesizes market research, audience insights, and competitive data into actionable briefs

nodes.label: Content Writer
nodes.description: Drafts blog posts, social copy, and email content based on briefs and brand voice

meta.capability: Generates marketing content from structured briefs while maintaining brand voice consistency

nodes.label: SEO Optimizer
nodes.description: Optimizes content for search with keyword placement, meta tags, and structure improvements

meta.capability: Applies SEO best practices to maximize organic visibility without compromising readability

nodes.label: Performance Analyst
nodes.description: Tracks content performance metrics and generates actionable optimization reports

meta.capability: Monitors content KPIs in real time and produces data-driven optimization recommendations

nodes.label: Brand Voice Guide
nodes.description: Rules for tone, style, terminology, and messaging across all content

nodes.label: Content Strategy
nodes.description: Editorial calendar, topic pillars, audience priorities, and channel mix

nodes.label: Analytics Data
nodes.description: Traffic, engagement, conversion, and attribution data from GA4, HubSpot, and social APIs

nodes.label: Audience Personas
nodes.description: Detailed profiles of target audience segments with needs, behaviors, and preferences

nodes.label: SEO Tools
nodes.description: Keyword data, SERP analysis, backlink profiles, and technical audit tools

nodes.label: Social Listening
nodes.description: Monitor social platforms, forums, and news for trending topics, audience sentiment, and competitive activity to inform the brief.

nodes.label: Create Visual Assets
nodes.description: Design or source supporting imagery, graphics, infographics, and video thumbnails aligned with the content brief and brand guidelines.

nodes.label: Legal Review
nodes.description: Screen content for regulatory compliance, IP risk, disclosure requirements, and claims substantiation before publication.

nodes.label: Accessibility Check
nodes.description: Verify content meets WCAG standards, inclusive language guidelines, and alt-text requirements for all visual assets.

nodes.label: Localize Content
nodes.description: Adapt approved content for target markets including translation, cultural adaptation, local regulatory compliance, and region-specific imagery.

nodes.label: A/B Variant Creation
nodes.description: Generate test variants for headlines, CTAs, subject lines, and imagery based on channel benchmarks and historical performance data.

nodes.label: Repurpose Content
nodes.description: Derive secondary assets from the primary content piece: social posts, email snippets, video scripts, carousel decks, and pull quotes.

nodes.label: Archive & Tag
nodes.description: Classify, tag, and archive content into the content taxonomy for future discovery, reuse, and governance reporting.

nodes.label: Legal Compliance Gate
nodes.description: Legal sign-off confirming content is clear of regulatory risk, IP issues, and disclosure requirements. Required before stakeholder sign-off.

meta.autoPassCriteria: No flagged claims, no regulated terms, disclosure checklist complete
meta.escalationTrigger: Regulated industry claim, competitor mention, or unsubstantiated performance data

nodes.label: Localization Quality Gate
nodes.description: Quality check on localized content for translation accuracy, cultural appropriateness, and local regulatory compliance.

meta.autoPassCriteria: Translation confidence score above 90%, no cultural flags, local legal checklist passed
meta.escalationTrigger: Cultural sensitivity flag, legal divergence across markets, or translation confidence below 75%

nodes.label: Social Listening Agent
nodes.description: Monitors social platforms, forums, and news feeds for trending topics, sentiment shifts, and competitive activity relevant to the content pipeline.

meta.capability: Synthesizes real-time social signals, trending topics, and sentiment data into actionable pre-brief intelligence

nodes.label: Legal Screening Agent
nodes.description: Pre-screens content for regulatory compliance, flagging claims that require substantiation, regulated terminology, and missing disclosures.

meta.capability: Scans content against legal guidelines and regulatory databases to flag compliance risks before human legal review

nodes.label: Localization Agent
nodes.description: Adapts content for target markets including translation, cultural adaptation, and region-specific formatting.

meta.capability: Translates and culturally adapts content across markets while preserving brand voice and complying with local regulations

nodes.label: Repurposing Agent
nodes.description: Derives secondary content formats from a primary asset: social posts, email copy, video scripts, test variants, and carousel decks.

meta.capability: Generates multi-format derivative content and A/B test variants from a single approved asset while maintaining brand and message consistency

nodes.label: Accessibility Agent
nodes.description: Checks content against WCAG standards, inclusive language guidelines, and alt-text requirements.

meta.capability: Evaluates content and visual assets for accessibility compliance and inclusive language, generating remediation recommendations

nodes.label: Legal Guidelines
nodes.description: Regulatory compliance policies, disclosure requirements, IP guidelines, and claims substantiation rules by market and industry.

nodes.label: Content Taxonomy
nodes.description: Hierarchical tagging schema covering content types, topics, audiences, funnel stages, and lifecycle states for governance and reuse.

nodes.label: Competitor Content Library
nodes.description: Indexed repository of competitor content, messaging themes, channel strategies, and share-of-voice benchmarks.

nodes.label: Channel Performance Benchmarks
nodes.description: Historical and industry benchmarks for engagement rates, CTR, conversion, and cost-per-action by channel and content type.

nodes.label: Approval Matrix
nodes.description: Routing rules that define who approves what based on content type, sensitivity level, market, and budget threshold.

nodes.label: Asset Library (DAM)
nodes.description: Digital asset management system containing approved images, templates, brand elements, video clips, and design files.

nodes.label: Accessibility Standards
nodes.description: WCAG 2.1 AA guidelines, inclusive language reference, alt-text requirements, and accessible design patterns.

nodes.label: Localization Style Guides
nodes.description: Market-specific style guides covering translation preferences, cultural taboos, local regulatory nuances, and regional brand voice adaptations.

nodes.label: Customer Data Platform
nodes.description: Unified customer profiles including behavioral signals, segment membership, propensity scores, lifecycle stage, and interaction history across all touchpoints.

meta.source: CDP platform (Segment, Tealium, Adobe RT-CDP, or equivalent)

nodes.label: Personalization Rules
nodes.description: Decisioning logic that maps content variants to audience segments, including suppression rules, frequency caps, next-best-content logic, and fallback hierarchy.

nodes.label: Segment-Variant Mapping
nodes.description: Map approved content variants and A/B test variants to CDP audience segments using personalization rules, propensity scores, and channel affinity data.

nodes.label: Dynamic Content Assembly
nodes.description: Construct the delivered experience per segment: select hero image, headline variant, CTA, and layout based on segment-variant matrix and real-time behavioral signals.

nodes.label: Personalization QA Gate
nodes.description: Validate segment-variant matrix for coverage gaps, suppression conflicts, frequency cap violations, and consent compliance before dynamic assembly.

meta.autoPassCriteria: All segments have assigned variants, no suppression conflicts, frequency caps within limits, consent flags validated
meta.escalationTrigger: Segment with no variant, consent flag missing, or frequency cap exceeded for priority segment

nodes.label: Personalization Agent
nodes.description: Matches content variants to audience segments using CDP signals, personalization rules, and channel affinity data. Handles dynamic assembly of delivered experiences.

meta.capability: Maps content variants to customer segments using behavioral signals and personalization logic, then assembles the delivered experience per segment in real time

nodes.label: Campaign Planning
nodes.description: Define campaign objectives, audience targets, channel mix, budget allocation, timeline, and success KPIs before any content requests are generated.

nodes.label: Budget Allocation
nodes.description: Campaign and channel-level budget constraints, spend pacing rules, and ROI thresholds by content type and audience segment.

nodes.label: Consent & Privacy Check
nodes.description: Validate that all personalization, targeting, and data usage complies with GDPR, CCPA, and other applicable privacy regulations. Verify consent signals from CDP before segment activation.

nodes.label: Privacy Regulations
nodes.description: Current consent requirements, data processing rules, and opt-out handling procedures by jurisdiction (GDPR, CCPA, LGPD, PIPEDA, etc.).

nodes.label: Privacy Compliance Agent
nodes.description: Validates consent signals, checks data processing compliance, and enforces suppression rules based on jurisdiction-specific privacy regulations.

meta.capability: Automatically validates consent status for targeted segments and flags privacy violations before content delivery

nodes.label: Paid Media Creative
nodes.description: Produce ad creative, landing page variants, and sponsored content versions derived from the approved organic content, tailored to platform specs and audience targeting.

nodes.label: Media Plan
nodes.description: Channel-level media buy strategy including platform targeting parameters, bid strategies, flight dates, and creative rotation rules.

nodes.label: Attribution & ROI Analysis
nodes.description: Run multi-touch attribution models, calculate content ROI by channel and segment, and generate spend efficiency analysis against campaign KPIs and budget allocation.

nodes.label: Executive Reporting
nodes.description: Synthesize performance data, attribution results, and budget utilization into an executive-level dashboard with strategic recommendations for the CMO and leadership team.

nodes.label: Competitive Response
nodes.description: Rapid-turn content creation triggered by competitive signals: counter-messaging, reactive thought leadership, or opportunistic content responding to competitor moves or market shifts.

nodes.label: Content Governance Review
nodes.description: Periodic review of live content for accuracy, regulatory currency, brand alignment drift, and performance decay. Flag content for refresh, retirement, or archival.

nodes.label: Governance Gate
nodes.description: Periodic checkpoint validating that all live content remains current, compliant, and brand-aligned. Triggers refresh, retirement, or re-review cycles.

meta.autoPassCriteria: Content less than 90 days old, no regulatory changes in category, performance above decay threshold
meta.escalationTrigger: Regulatory change affecting live content, brand guideline update, or content older than 180 days with declining performance

nodes.label: Journey Stage Mapping
nodes.description: Map content assets to customer journey stages (awareness, consideration, decision, retention, advocacy) using CDP lifecycle data and content taxonomy.

nodes.label: Sentiment Monitoring
nodes.description: Real-time monitoring of audience sentiment, brand mention tone, and content reception signals across social, reviews, and support channels to detect issues before they escalate.

nodes.label: Sales Enablement Content
nodes.description: Produce sales-facing content derived from marketing assets: battle cards, case studies, ROI calculators, objection handlers, competitive one-pagers, and pitch decks.

nodes.label: Sales Feedback Log
nodes.description: Structured feedback from sales teams on content effectiveness, objection patterns, win/loss themes, and content gaps surfaced during the sales cycle.

meta.source: CRM integration — sales team feedback, win/loss analysis

nodes.label: Influencer & Creator Brief
nodes.description: Develop briefs for influencer collaborations, UGC campaigns, and co-created content including brand guardrails, messaging guidelines, platform specs, and compensation terms.

nodes.label: UGC Moderation & Curation
nodes.description: Review, moderate, and curate user-generated and influencer-created content for brand safety, quality, rights clearance, and strategic alignment before amplification.

nodes.label: Influencer Database
nodes.description: Vetted influencer and creator profiles with audience demographics, brand affinity scores, past performance data, rate cards, and compliance history.

nodes.label: Content Scoring & Prioritization
nodes.description: Score and rank incoming content requests against strategic priority, audience demand, resource availability, and expected ROI. Triage the production queue.

nodes.label: Content Scoring Matrix
nodes.description: Weighted scoring framework for content requests incorporating strategic alignment, audience demand, competitive urgency, resource cost, and expected business impact.

nodes.label: Cross-Channel Orchestration
nodes.description: Define distribution sequencing, channel-specific timing rules, and cross-channel coordination logic. Email before social, gated before ungated, paid amplification triggers.

nodes.label: Orchestration Rules
nodes.description: Cross-channel sequencing logic including channel priority order, timing offsets, trigger conditions for paid amplification, gating rules, and holdout group definitions.
